remarks: Product/subtraction property of a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2005.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnopl.1 $e |- T e. LinOp $.
lnopmulsubi $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( T ` ( ( A .h B ) -h C ) ) = ( ( A .h ( T ` B ) ) -h ( T ` C ) ) ) $.
